name: Psychic Sensitivity
description: You unlock the secrets of the occult world.
benefit: You gain access to occult skill unlocks (see page 194) for any skills in which you have ranks. If you have no ranks in the appropriate skill, you canâ€™t use the occult skill unlock, even if that skill can be used untrained.
normal: You must have the ability to cast psychic spells in order to use occult skill unlocks.
